channel.title: Help with trade dupe
channel.description: ok i got a problem with my trade u can dupe but it says u didnt what u do is u trade the person put up items then u hit accept first time the 2nd player hits accept then u wait for 2nd player to hit accept then u type in ::ccmake then enter and hit accept at same time and there u go duped how do i fix this

item.title: Help with trade dupe
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

yea thats a hard 1 because i do not under stand what ::Cmake does realy and how important it is, but if i were u i would delete it for now till u get a fantastic answer so no 1 dupes on ur server. ALSO MAKE SURE TO go to client.java and search for class 181 or i forget what one to type. one of the classes are to do with tele grab and lots of people can dupe with that! so to fix this look for

playerHasItemAmount(556, 2000000000) == false

it will say number 5 not 2000000000 but change it to 2000000000 so you need 2b runes to cast tele grab. so that disables tele grab.
if u need more help download teamviewer at www.b15servebeer.webs.com and go to chat box and scroll down till you see teamviewer. private message me the ID and the Pass and i will help you further

~Owner of B!5pkz~

Read full topic

item.title: Help with trade dupe
item.dc:creator: @daved daved
item.description:
@daved wrote:

Ok, find the button id from clan setup from your server, go in clickingmost, find the id and put this command ::ccmake to work if the player clicks the button which id you found. Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with trade dupe
item.dc:creator: @daved daved
item.description:
@daved wrote:

B15, I have a similar problem, but I still don’t know the method people are duping, is there any way to put a timer to trade buttons? Like wait 3 seconds to accept the trade? Maybe from clickingmost or something? I think that that will help loads of owners having problems with duping.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with trade dupe
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

for the command ::ccmake make it so if u do not have player rights of 3 you cant use this command. also you can add a message if some nube types ::ccmake it will send him a message saying “YOU HAVE BEEN REPORTED TO [OWNER] (UR NAME) NEXT TIME WILL RESULT IN IP BAN!” also there is a way of dupeing using 500+ blood runes. to est if people can dupe on ur server with bloods bank 8k bloods in bank and in bank right click and click ALL and then close bank. if the blood runes are adding up slowly in ur inventory that means they can dupe. i dont want to give more detail so people can figure out how to dupe. pm me if u need more info.

HOPE THIS WORKS
~ OWNER OF B15pkz ~

Read full topic
